blog.name: hornyspacesnakes
blog.title: This was supposed to be a homestuck blog

body:
Consider

Eddie visiting New York and Venom fanboying over spiderman

And then when they run into him Eddie is like ‘that’s a child!’ And venom just. Grabs spidey and shrieks in his face “why is a child jumpeing off buildings and fighting crime?!”

Spidey isn’t actually a child anymore though, he’d be AT LEAST 18 at this point so he’s 1)annoyed at being called a child, 2)confused because a weird goo monster is apparently concerned for his well being, 3) scared because a weird goo monster is clutching him in its claws, and 4)horny because he grew up on the internet and is very familiar with the concept of monsterfucking

So naturally he just blurts out “well mark me down as scared AND horny” and then he just fucking dies of embarrassment and meanwhile venom and Eddie are just so shocked they can’t even move or think

blog.description: Avah, 18 | Certified Mom Friend™ | this is an ANTI ST*RK*R blog so fuck off | icon by @spider-boiii | TS Blog (@playershatersandfakers) | My Gifs | Archive | #useritsthwippingtime

question: Some spider-boi headcanons?
answer:
So sorry this took so long, I wanted to get it just right. Consider this a part two to this post. @anidiotwithapen deserves credit because we bounce head canons off each other all the time and a good number of these were half formed by them!

  • Peter gets really cold. Really really cold. He absentmindedly grabs peoples hands or huddles closer to people to gain some warmth from them; Tony doesn’t notice anymore and instinctively wraps his arm around him whenever Peter gets super close; May always has extra blankets and sweatshirts in her car.  
  • Peter wants so badly to communicate with spiders; if he sees one while patrolling, or in the compound, he’ll wave to it, say hi, whatever. He swears he saw one wave back one time
  • Peter keeps an eye out for spider eggs, especially when looking in parks and busy areas that could do lots of harm to Baby Spider. especially in the winter, when spider eggs are supposed to be kept warm in their pouch. 
  • Peter is completely taken with Baby Stark; they have him wrapped around their little finger and it doesn’t take much before he’s putty in their hands
  • Peter loves spending time with Pepper and he knows that she and May would be absolute best friends; he tries for /months/ to arrange this meeting
  • Pepper tells Peter stories about the all she has had to deal with working alongside Tony for all these years. 
  • When Peter comes back to life, he can’t sleep; he’s afraid he’ll wake up in the soul world again and if he doesn’t sleep he won’t wake up
  • Assuming Tony dies in A4: 
    • Peter spends most of his time in the lab, he doesn’t really talk to anyone. Occasionally Bruce or Vision or the bots will go down there to check on him and/or bring him food; Pepper can’t bring herself to enter the lab or she would be checking on him too 
    • Peter lashes out. a lot. mostly at the other avengers. he doesn’t mean to be mean. but he blames them for not stopping tony. he blames them for not listening to him. he blames them for not sticking together as a team, a family. but really, he lashes out because he blames himself.  
    • The moment Peter sees that Tony has a kid, he vows to protect this kid with every fiber of his being; to be what to Baby Stark what Tony was to Peter. 
    • Peter makes sure that as Baby Stark grows up they remember their father; all his greatest accomplishments, all the people he saved, they know he’s a hero. but Peter - and eventually the rest of the avengers - make sure Baby Starks knows their dad wasn’t just a suit of army, but a real man with so many great qualities, sure some flaws, and that he loved his family so so much. Peter makes sure Baby Stark understands exactly what happened to Tony, when they’re old enough to understand. 
  • Moving away from dead Tony Peter most definitely invites MJ, Ned, and Shuri (when she’s in town) to the compound as much as possible; Cassie is eventually introduced and invited as well Peter plays pranks on everyone in the compound except Nat; ironically, he’s the only that could pull a prank on Nat and live to tell the tale 
  • Peter, MJ, Ned, Shuri, and Cassie test to see if Peter is allergic to mint water; this is basically Tony’s reaction upon finding them 20 minutes later.
  • After the Snap and the Soul World and the defeat of Thanos 
    • Peter is quiet and stays quiet for weeks; Tony and May both recognize that the light in his eyes has burned brighter in the past. it takes months and months and months of sleepless nights and therapy sessions and panic attacks and nightmares and staying up days at a time but eventually - slowly, he begins to recover  
    • Sometimes Peter would go missing for hours at a time; he didn’t mean to - peter would never purposefully make May worry - sometimes he’d just get overwhelmed at school and absentmindedly walk out the front door, or he’d miss training at the compound. Tony always found him, always ending up at the same spot: Uncle Ben’s grave
  • Nat is the first to know Peter is Spider-Man; Peter trusts her completely. She secretly likes having another Spider themed super hero 
  • Peter freaks when meeting Ant Man because ‘you can control aNTS????’

Of course theres so many more but I have an essay due in a few hours and couldn’t spend a whole lot of time on this. Thanks for asking, I love doing these!!!

  • Assuming Tony dies in A4: 
    • Peter spends most of his time in the lab, he doesn’t really talk to anyone. Occasionally Bruce or Vision or the bots will go down there to check on him and/or bring him food; Pepper can’t bring herself to enter the lab or she would be checking on him too 
    • Peter lashes out. a lot. mostly at the other avengers. he doesn’t mean to be mean. but he blames them for not stopping tony. he blames them for not listening to him. he blames them for not sticking together as a team, a family. but really, he lashes out because he blames himself.  
    • The moment Peter sees that Tony has a kid, he vows to protect this kid with every fiber of his being; to be what to Baby Stark what Tony was to Peter. 
    • Peter makes sure that as Baby Stark grows up they remember their father; all his greatest accomplishments, all the people he saved, they know he’s a hero. but Peter - and eventually the rest of the avengers - make sure Baby Starks knows their dad wasn’t just a suit of army, but a real man with so many great qualities, sure some flaws, and that he loved his family so so much. Peter makes sure Baby Stark understands exactly what happened to Tony, when they’re old enough to understand. 
  • Moving away from dead Tony Peter most definitely invites MJ, Ned, and Shuri (when she’s in town) to the compound as much as possible; Cassie is eventually introduced and invited as well Peter plays pranks on everyone in the compound except Nat; ironically, he’s the only that could pull a prank on Nat and live to tell the tale 
  • Peter, MJ, Ned, Shuri, and Cassie test to see if Peter is allergic to mint water; this is basically Tony’s reaction upon finding them 20 minutes later.
  • After the Snap and the Soul World and the defeat of Thanos 
    • Peter is quiet and stays quiet for weeks; Tony and May both recognize that the light in his eyes has burned brighter in the past. it takes months and months and months of sleepless nights and therapy sessions and panic attacks and nightmares and staying up days at a time but eventually - slowly, he begins to recover  
    • Sometimes Peter would go missing for hours at a time; he didn’t mean to - peter would never purposefully make May worry - sometimes he’d just get overwhelmed at school and absentmindedly walk out the front door, or he’d miss training at the compound. Tony always found him, always ending up at the same spot: Uncle Ben’s grave
  • Nat is the first to know Peter is Spider-Man; Peter trusts her completely. She secretly likes having another Spider themed super hero 
  • Peter freaks when meeting Ant Man because ‘you can control aNTS????’

Of course theres so many more but I have an essay due in a few hours and couldn’t spend a whole lot of time on this. Thanks for asking, I love doing these!!!
